subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm
ET/PT

PARIS HILTON: COUNTDOWN TO
LOCKDOWN!
Paris's pre-jail pampering! Just days before
her stint in the
slammer, Paris Hilton is reportedly
getting her hair and makeup
done! What!?!? The outrage over
how Paris Hilton is walking the
concrete carpet like the
red carpet. 

LINDSAY LOHAN REHAB SHOCKER
Okay, so Lindsay's in rehab. And we all hope she cleans
herself
up. But get this - there's still talk that she'll
have her 21st
birthday party at a hot Las Vegas nightclub,
right after she
gets out. Is this a joke? Linds, you may
want to rethink this
one. Showbiz Tonight looks into this
bizarre story.

MAKING IT WORK: STARS WHO MARRY
NON-STARS
Happy Hollywood marriages -- is the secret
for stars like Meryl
Streep, Marcia Cross and Julia Roberts
marrying someone who
isn't famous? Showbiz Tonight takes a
look at when  A-listers
make it work with people who aren't
even on the list!

KIRSTIE ALLEY
You loved
her in "Cheers," you didn't know what to think of her
in
"Fat Actress." Now Kirstie Alley is opening up like never
before: How did she lose all that weight, and does she
think
Hollywood discriminates against older actresses? It's
the
interview you'll see only on Showbiz Tonight!

IS THERE A KATIE COURIC CURSE?
No matter which
way you spin it, CBS has spent a lot of money
(we're
talking-buy-your own tropical-island amounts - $15
million
plus!) on Katie Couric, for a third-place CBS Evening
News
newscast. So why is perky not paying off? Why are her
ratings so bad? And is there any way to turn this news
nightmare around? Showbiz Tonight investigates.

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Katie
Couric: Should she have stayed at "The Today Show"?
VOTE AT
CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL! 
We want to hear your response to the Question of the Day,
or
whatever else is on your mind, on video. Responses must
be no
longer than 30 seconds. To do it, just head to
cnn.com/showbiztonight	Then tune in to see your video
email on
TV!

ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT THIS
WEEKEND
SATURDAY 6/2 - YOUNG HOLLYWOOD'S
MELTDOWN
From Lindsay Lohan to Paris Hilton to Britney
Spears, why can't
Hollywood's young stars stay out of
trouble? Do their parents
share some of the blame? From
rehab to jail, why is young
Hollywood so out of control?
You will not want to miss this
Showbiz Tonight Special
Event..

SUNDAY 6/3 - LINDSAY'S DESCENT INTO
DESPAIR
From her DUI arrest after a car crash to her
collapse outside a
club, has Lindsay Lohan hit rock bottom?
Who's to blame for her
out of control behavior? The
startling story and pictures!

WATCH SHOWBIZ TONIGHT
SEVEN NIGHTS A WEEK ON CNN HEADLINE
PRIME 11pm ET/PT
